basics.name: Ivan Levendyan
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: We help businesses to store, manage, protect and analyze their most valuable asset '97 information '97 in a more agile, trusted and cost-efficient way.   I am experienced specialist with pre-sales and business development background. Passion for technology and connecting it with people is what keeps me going and makes me a top performer in these roles. MBA and Engineering degrees also help a bit.

highlights: Development and execution of technical sales strategies for business partners across Western Canada and, later, nationally
Increasing EMC mind and wallet share of strategic (CIO) and technical (CTO) partner stakeholders
Technical evangelism, solution workshops/webinars, POCs, technical account management and other sales activities
Developing a tandem between EMC team and business partner teams
Incremental channel goal attainment for the area over and above natural growth: 2013 '96 117%, 2014 '96 146%, 2015 '96 136%
Increased EMC revenue share for a key partner to over 40% by developing partner professional services practice
Developed reusable solution portfolio for partners to drive down cost of sales and simplify technology enablement cycle
EMC Q1 2016 '93Gold'94 Award, EMC HiPo Systems Engineer, consistent '93far exceeds expectations'94 performance rating
Marketing requirements (MRD) execution, tech specification development, collaboration with R&D
Technical sales support: RFP, technical positioning, R&D escalation, API help
Created sales tools and collateral (competitive matrixes, demo/sales scripts, white papers etc.) and coached Sales on usage
Increased product revenue by $1M+ by developing sales tools that proved to win a number of deals
Contributed to 15% revenue increase by coaching sales representatives and supporting sales process of Quest solutions
Worked with sales and R&D as a customer advocate, served as a single point of contact
In the list of Top 5 Canadian engineers based on customer feedback
Developed various university and online freelance projects on Visual StudioC++, focusing on telephony and sensors
